metadata.title: Security and Encryption function of RA2 Series

sections.content:
Question:
What kind of Security and Encryption functions are supported by RA2 Series?
Answer:
RA2A1/RA2L1/RA2E1/RA2E2 supports AES hardware accelerator supporting ECB, CBC, CTR mode and TRNG (True Random Number Generator).
RA2A2 supports AES hardware accelerator supporting ECB, CBC, CTR, GCM, CMAC, CCM mode and TRNG.
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2A1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
